marytts.signalproc.adaptation.outlier
Class KMeansMappingEliminator

java.lang.Object
  marytts.signalproc.adaptation.outlier.KMeansMappingEliminator

public class KMeansMappingEliminator
extends java.lang.Object

K-Means clustering and mapping based outlier elimination. Clusters the source and target LSF, f0, energy, and duration features either jointly or separately. Uses cluster assignments of matched source-target pairs to detect and eliminate pairs which reside in outlier clusters.

Author:
Oytun Türk
